title: Real-time knowledge platform and technical learning playground
description:
Game Print Hub is a personal full-stack learning playground — partly built for fun, partly to help me grow as an engineer.

Here I experiment with frontend, backend, infrastructure, DevOps and 3D-printing workflows.

Even though the platform is deployed and actively evolving, it is far from a finished or polished product. Many features are incomplete, some routes are broken, and parts of the system may change significantly from week to week. Game Print Hub is a long-term learning project, not a commercial service.

Over time, as I improve the codebase and architecture, I hope this site will become a fully functional, stable environment that showcases my growth as an engineer.
scenariosDescription: A list of scenarios with progression, notes, house rules and table setup photos. Perfect for remembering what happened in each mission.
printingDescription: A local library of boxes, organizers and other 3D models for Frosthaven. Includes links to sources, notes about print settings, and status (printed / in queue).
